info.name: Bilddagboken.se - spacer.gif removal
info.description:
This css-code removes the spacer.gif Imageblocker at www.bilddagboken.se

Now, you little pervs won't have any problem at all saving images from bilddagboken with just a right click.

// Isterband

PS. FLASHBACK! \o/ DS.

Last update: 27/02/2010.
Reason: Added support for HD-images.
